item.title: OpenAlias lookup with ruby
item.description: Halloween nights are scary and you are supposed to do scary things. This year I had a few hours in the hotel and so I've built a ruby wrapper around the openalias.rs rust package. That is scary because I have no idea about rust :D But fist things first, what is OpenAlias? OpenAlias is an open standard for simpler addresses for any crypto currencies. It is a DNS based alias system that allows you to use a domain to lookup a cryptocurrency address.
